\begin{figure}
\centering
\begin{tikzpicture}
\begin{axis}[
%xmin = -1, xmax = 1,
ymin = -5, ymax = 75,
grid = major,
major grid style=dashed,
xlabel = Residuo, 
ylabel = Coeff. di mobilità (\AA$^2$),
width=0.91\textwidth,
legend columns=2
]

\addplot [mark=*, mark size=0.7pt, blue] table {\mytablebf};
\addplot [mark=*, mark size=0.7pt, green] table {\mytabledodici};
\addplot [mark=*, mark size=0.7pt, cyan] table {\mytablequattordici};
\addplot [mark=*, mark size=0.7pt, magenta] table {\mytablesedici};
\addplot [mark=*, mark size=0.7pt, red] table {\mytablediciotto};
\addplot [mark=*, mark size=0.7pt, black] table {\mytableventi};

\legend{ B-factor ,$ r_{c} = 12 \: \AA{} $,$ r_{c} = 14 \: \AA{} $,$ r_{c} = 16 \: \AA{} $,$ r_{c} = 18 \: \AA{} $,$ r_{c} = 20 \: \AA{} $}
\end{axis}
\end{tikzpicture}
\caption{Profili di mobilità al variare del raggio di cutoff}
\label{fig:mob_2}
\end{figure}
